content.detailedDescription: I'm working night shift and went outside to smoke.  as i was smoking i was staring at the night sky as i always do.  i caught movement from my periphrial vision coming from the north west.  i first noticed the three faint red lights in a triangle and thought maybe it was a meteorite, but there was no tail and the lights didn't change color.  as it crossed my 12:00 the nearly full moon showed the wedge shape quite well.  as a retired air force member i'm quite familiar with aircraft and their flight characteristics.  the object was flying at approximately 10,000 ft and made no noise.  i waited well past it had crossed the south east horizon listening for any sound and heard none.  the object was approximately 200 ft in length and 50 ft thick with three red lights on the underside.  it appeared to be black or at least non-reflective in color and texture.  the time it took to cross from the nothwest to the southeast was approximately 3-4 seconds.
content.summary: Black wedge w/red lights cross horizon to horizon in 3-4 seconds

content.detailedDescription:
I just got off of work and saw a bright light zoom from the left side of the street to the right then back to the left side of the street then hover in place for about thirty seconds. i then ran inside and grabed my camera and my step-dad came back outside and it was still hovering in the same place.; it slowly begain to move toward us in a sweeping arch almost like a helicoper but no sound was being made and there were no roters. at first i thought it was a helicopter but as it drew near i had a feeling like my chest was being pushed on it stop its arch and hovered for bout five seconds then started to move in an arch away from us over the city. it looked almost like it was landing about half a mile away because it was dipping below house height at a steady pace. i then got into my truck and drove to were i could see the whole city and nothing was in the air the time between i first lost sight of the object to the point where i could see anything in the city air was bout forty seconds to a minute.

the object appeared to be disc or cigar shaped with a with a larger disc running through the center of the object. a red light was on the top leading edge and a blue light on the top trailing edge. as it moved over amarillo the city lights partially illumminated it. a blue/white light seemed to be emminating from the bottom.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright steady white light red and blue lights fadeing in and out long cigar shaped steady blue light on bottom.

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking pictures of unique cloud formations in my backyard.  they looked like effects of chemtrails with some areas having a "oil" sheen affect on them.  i took perhaps 20 pictures and downloaded them to the computer.  i slightly balanced levels on the photo and they were easily visible, though without the balancing they were more difficult to make out, though easily seen. 
i did not notice them while taking the pictures.
content.summary: Taking pictures of unique cloud formation.  when downloaded to comp, ufos were visible.

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was about 12 years old at that time. i was on the shore on penobscot bay near camden, me, having a picnic lunch with my mother.
2. it was so big it was impossible not to see it. we were sitting, looking at the sky and ocean and in it came.
3. at first, thought it was a plane coming down, but then realized it was round, disc shaped.
4. it was disc or round shaped, grayish, coming in extremely fast and at an extremely sharp angle and quite close to us.
5. surprised, curious, not really scared but bewildered. was excited bit mother was scared and grabbed me by the hand and hustled us to the cottage. she seemed pretty shook up.
6. it disappeared into the water.
content.summary: A large grayish disc came in from the east at a  steep  angle and entered the water at a high rate of speed

content.detailedDescription:
It was a completely overcast sky with a ceiling well over a few thousand feet. there was no visible sun.

i arrived at the trailhead parking some time around 2:40pm on 11/15/07.

on my way up to the perimeter of the breached volcanic cone (red mountain is an old cinder cone which has an entire side of the mountain missing ��� exposing red rock surface composed of cinder) i began snapping pictures of the mountain. 

i continued snapping pictures through the majority of the hike ��� some as few as a couple of minutes apart ��� some as long 15 minutes between shots.

i stayed at the mountain well until nightfall. with exception of a father and daughter that left the rim around 3:45pm (there name is in the log book before mine.)

the only interaction i had with other people on the mountain was with the gentleman and his daughter. we talked for a few minutes about the unique geological features of the area. they did not report anything.

i myself was not looking for anything out of the ordinary. the pictures were intended for family showings.

the camera was a fuji finepix s5000. it is a 3mp camera that interpolates to 6mp. (the setting was 6mp on the photos.)

this is not the original picture ��� it is an edited pic - my intials are embedded within the trunks of a few trees for claim. the original can be rendered to investigators ��� so long as i get credited for the original picture. (no color correction was used ��� the use of color correction adds some scale and interesting detail.)

the shaded corners come from a defect of the camera ��� the shaded areas are from a screw on cylinder that comes attached to the camera. (it is supposed to reduce glare)

my gps coordinates were within 2 tenths of a mile from 35��� 32.040n and 111��� 52.105w when the picture was taken ��� on the trailhead. (waas accuracy is +- 33 feet ��� i noticed that as an average when tracking on my hike.)

the proximity of the sun was not in line with the anomaly ��� the moon was not visible for another 3 hours. (it ended up being a crescent viewed near middle the top of the mountain ��� some time later after i descended. the picture is provided for scale reference.)

there are three pictures submitted total. 

the edited copy of the picture, a picture of the moon, and a picture taken 2 minutes after the edited picture ��� this is to prove i did not have a spec of dirt on the lens.

the protective lens cover was replaced after every set of pictures taken. at no point ��� was the lens off the camera between pictures or before pictures.


i have full confidence in my camera and have used it a lot over the past few years. it is old and there have been times i have have a fouled lens. this picture does not exhibit any similarity to what i have seen when my lens is fouled.

unfortunately - i did not actually see the ufo. i was looking for scenes - not ufo's. (i am sure it would have been barely visible - i have pretty sharp non-corrected vision.)
content.summary: Sphere over red mountain - northern arizona

content.detailedDescription: Check this web cam i have been watching these cam's for an hour now and have sevreal pic's to come activity in camelback mountian and south mountain.I will post the pics later tonight.When the activity slows down.Here is the link http://www.Phoenixvis.Net/came1/index.Html
content.summary: Ufo's over pheonix now!!!

content.detailedDescription: This happened in the north parking lot at harry& david. i always take a fast look around the sky in the morning. the first thought was a airplane. it was like headlights on a car shining at an angle towards me, with one a little higher there were some clouds in the air but it was pertty much clear they were going as fast as a satellite or faster as i said think headlights on a car [ hi-beam] watched them for 5-8 min maybe longer till they went over the mountains there speed was steady no blinking lights no trail of anything behind them no up and down they just travled in a steady line west - east they looked like they were 3 mi. apart like military aircraft if one had a ruler in there hand and looked at the objects they would have been 1/2" across? i have seen similiar objects in daylight but they do not shine its more of a round haze the speed was pertty fast.[ i have seen many things over the years and this is the first time of reporting it ]there are two reasons why im doing this i would like to know what i saw? and i saw your commerical on tv also the moon was full they pasted in front at the bottm of the moon there shine dimed a little but once past they were bright again i have thought of every thing they might be then ruled it out or as sherlock holmes said after you have ruled every thing out you can think of and no matter how bazare [ufo]then thats what it is. yes i was a little excited but i did not think much of it till later when i found out that another person saw it from a differnt angle and described the same thing to me thx. henry
content.summary: Two lights moving west to east about as fast as a satellite or faster

content.detailedDescription: On october 1, 2007 my husband, two children and i were leaving granville, ohio from the rt. 37 exit to head to zanesville for a soccer game. it was right around 5:10 pm on a monday. we stopped at a stoplight and saw a hovering bright white light in the sky to the right - west - over state route 16. it was daylight out, although it was cloudy. it was weird - almost impossible - to see such a bright light in the daytime. i pointed it out to everyone and we were all staring at it. as we watched, it seemed to turn to the left in mid-air and the light moved over horizontally, kind of like an eclipse and became a silvery dome-shaped object. i said, "omighod. did you see that?" we all agreed but then the stoplight turned green and we took off and turned east on the highway. we couldn't see it anymore, although i continued to look in the sideview mirror and out at the sky. i've never seen anything else like that in my life.
content.summary: Bright white light hovering over rt. 16 turns mid-air and becomes silver dome-shaped aircraft

content.detailedDescription:
While picking up an arriving passenger and driving away from the passenger loading area at the long beach airport, we saw a green light moving rapidly in the sky off to the right (and behind us) as we drove away from the airport.  ("off to the right and behind" is from the driver's perspective.)  we were still in the parking area, inside the streets within the airport complex.  it appeared to be over the buildings adjacent to the airport, possibly ending its flight over the airport.  

we were exiting the passenger pick up area, just past the left turn at the end of the pick up area.  we were on the stretch of road lined with waiting taxis (i think this is their waiting area).  i do not know the compass orientation here, but if you were standing in the middle of the street facing the airport, next to the waiting taxis (on your left), the object appeared off to what would be your left and flew toward the airport grounds.  off to your left are, i believe, buildings belonging to aircraft companies and such.

the object moved rapidly from higher altitude to lower on a path that gave the impression of being a gentle arc.  it gave the impression of being very close and very small.  the only thing i could compare it to would be a small remote-controlled toy airplane with a bright green light, which seems very unlikely to be flying in the immediate vicinity of a busy airport.  the light was very bright, very distinct.

i am curious if your organization knows anything about such sightings.  the vicinity to the airport makes me think it might be a military/security apparatus of some sort, but i have never seen anything like it in my life near any other airport.  (i should also note that i spend time near the lb airport picking someone up regularly, sometimes waiting for extended periods in parking lots nearby or near the taxi stands, and have never seen this before.  also--the area near where we saw it was very close to the taxi waiting line, so perhaps some of the waiting drivers saw it.)

this was at 7pm on a sunday night (tonight) and the airport was busy, though the parking and pick up areas were not as packed as they have been on other occasions.
content.summary: Tiny green light in the air over/near long beach airport

content.detailedDescription:
On sunday, november 18, 2007, my partner and i observed three ufo's flying high in the late afternoon sky over palm springs, california. the sightings occurred at approximately 4:30 p.M. the crafts remained visible to the naked eye for about five minutes before disappearing.

we were in the downtown area of palm springs when the sighting occurred. i was the first to notice something unusual. i was looking up towards the moon (which was clearly visible to me at that hour) when i spotted an elongated boomerang, or triangular shaped craft flying in a southwest direction. at first, the object appeared to be flying in a straight line like a normal aircraft. it also seemed to be at about the same altitude that a commercial aircraft normally flies while at cruising altitude, approximately 25,000-35,000 feet. from that distance, i would estimate the size of the craft to be similar in size to a small to medium sized commercial aircraft. 

while watching the unidentified craft for a minute or so, i noticed that it started to move in ways that normal aircraft don���t. it slowly came to a stop, suspended in midair like a helicopter. that���s when i pointed it out to my partner, who saw the object as clearly as i had. the craft then moved around its location sluggishly and, in what appeared to be, a somewhat erratic fashion. all of the sudden, two other identical craft came into view in close relative proximity to the fist craft. the three objects began to slowly ���wobble��� towards a center point. for about four or five minutes they leisurely moved around and, on occasion, become completely stationary. once the objects reached their center point destination, they vanished from sight.

it should be noted that the sky at that time of day was perfectly clear with exceptional visibility. each craft was identical in size and shape to one another. another unusual attribute of the crafts was that although they were shaped like a boomerang, they flew with the curvature to one side. in other words, the objects flew ���sideways���. we discussed the possibility that the objects could have been birds, but discounted that theory because of the size of the objects and the fact that they came together and disappeared.

our reactions to the sighting were pretty tempered. neither of us got overly excited or anxious. after the sighting we discussed the event and came to the conclusion that what we had seen was, more than likely, three craft from another planet. 

about the witnesses: i am a 47 year-old marketing executive and creative consultant to the motion picture industry. i hold a b.A. degree in radio, television, and film from a major university in southern california. i am an faa licensed pilot certified to fly single engine aircraft. my partner is also 47 years old and has post-graduate degrees in political science and art history from a prestigious and internationally recognized university.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Three identical craft sighted over palm spings, california slowly come together...And vanish

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i went out into our back yard and then looked up to the sky when the two of us saw these two gold globes in the sky.  we began watching them and talking. objects were stationary for about 3 minutes.  i ran into the house during that time while my wife stayed and watched.  by the time i made it back outside my wife said something kind of like a flair fell from the higher one and disapeared a short distance from it. finally the the highest one began to disapear and then about 15 seconds later it came back into sight.  the other did the same at a different time.  the highest one then began to travel southwest to northeast across the louisiana/texas border.  it made it right overhead and then we noticed a light pattern on it that was like watching chaser lights going in a triangular pattern but with only three lights.  the lower one had been dimming and brightening over and over again and then finally started to move.  it was much slower than the higher one.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 2 gold globes glowing in sky, when finally moving lights motioned in chasing triangular pattern.

content.detailedDescription: As i was walking home from the grocery store in allston, ma (a suburb of boston), i looked up into the sky and was confused, for it appeared that there were two suns in the sky above me.  in a split second i realized that the "sun" to the left of the real sun was a shining orb of light, the same size of the sun and bright enough to nearly equal that of the sun.  i shaded my eyes to look at it for a few seconds.  it was stationary (not moving) and it had what appeared to be part of a rainbow like band of orange and pink extending from it.  i looked around me to see if anyone else noticed this or was looking up at the sky, but everyone was oblivious.  i convinced myself that it must be a natural phenomenon and i crossed the street to deposit my groceries in my apartment.  when i went out again approximately 15 minutes later and looked up at the same area of the sky, it was gone.  what was this?  has anyone else reported this?  what could it have been?  i'm not a ufo watcher by any means, but i'm always looking at the sky - i have never seen any thing like this before.
content.summary: Stationary disk that appeared like a second "sun"

content.detailedDescription: As i was walking home from the grocery store in allston, ma (a suburb of boston), i looked up into the sky and was confused, for it appeared that there were two suns in the sky above me.  in a split second i realized that the "sun" to the left of the real sun was a shining orb of light, the same size of the sun and bright enough to nearly equal that of the sun.  i shaded my eyes to look at it for a few seconds.  it was stationary (not moving) and it had what appeared to be part of a rainbow like band of orange and pink extending from it.  i looked around me to see if anyone else noticed this or was looking up at the sky, but everyone was oblivious.  i convinced myself that it must be a natural phenomenon and i crossed the street to deposit my groceries in my apartment.  when i went out again approximately 15 minutes later and looked up at the same area of the sky, it was gone.  what was this?  has anyone else reported this?  what could it have been?  i'm not a ufo watcher by any means, but i'm always looking at the sky - i have never seen any thing like this before.
content.summary: Stationary disk that appeared like a second "sun"

content.detailedDescription:
I was prompted to file this report after hearing of the ���phoenix lights��� for the first time last night.  to be honest my memory of this event is sketchy but i can tell you what i remember.

it was either 1999 or 2000 within the first few months of the year.  i think it was february.  i was an undergraduate physics & astronomy student with central michigan university and i was with a group of two other students and our instructor.  we were taking advantage of some time with the nuro telescope on anderson mesa near flagstaff, az.  

one night we left our control room to go outside and look at the stars.  i don���t remember what time it was unfortunately.  as we were standing there after a few minutes we noticed a ���v��� pattern of lights  flying in a counter-clockwise circular path that took it overhead, then to the north(toward flagstaff),  toward the west at its other extent, south and then back up overhead.   this triangle was being trailed by a red light (not blinking) that was a good distance behind.  too far behind to be attached to the tail of an airplane.  this red light was noticeable when we first took note of the formation but after 2 to 3 minutes it vanished while the formation was due west of us.  the triangular pattern continued its circle.  i do not recall the color of the v pattern lights. 

if memory serves me correctly i counted twenty lights, ten to each leg of the ���v���.  i ran in and grabbed a pair of binoculars and upon viewing the lights while it was directly overhead  i  saw the silhouette of an airplane with wings swept back at an approximately 45 degree angle and the lights were on the leading edges of the wings.  the silhouette looked strange to me.  the wings were attached to the fuselage about 1/3 of the way forward from the tail with the ���nose��� making up the other 2/3 of the length.  while some of the details are foggy in my memory, i remember these proportions as they seemed quite atypical of any plane i���d seen.  the body was slender and the wings were slender and relatively long.  

i don���t remember what ultimately became of this plane.  as to whether it flew off or the lights went out i don���t recall.  now at the time i was unfamiliar with the ���phoenix lights��� but was familiar with ufo sightings of triangular / v shaped light configurations.  my opinion at the time and even now was that this plane and its trailing light were, for whatever reason, deliberately trying to appear as such a configuration.  hearing of the phoenix lights makes it seem even more plausible.  

now it could have been an aircraft in a holding pattern around the flagstaff airport which is south of town and was to our west.  this is a possibility, however it still seems strange that it would have so many leading lights, would have a red light trailing quite far behind, and in the middle of the night would have to continually circle a small regional airport which according to my professor no longer received any commercial flights and has sparse traffic even in the daytime.
content.summary: V shaped pattern over flagstaff similar to "phoenix lights"

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on the bleachers at my girlfriends soccer game when i kick went astray and the ball rolled off the field past and behind the bleachers. i turned around to follow the ball and out of the the corner of my eye i noticed a bright object hovering (seemingly) above the farther soccer field in the park. at first i thought its just a plane flying towards me but a few seconds later to the objects northeast (assuming the top of the object is north on a compass) i noticed the signature flashing lights of a plane fly right past the object. the plane was incredibly small compared to the object that was hovering. i continued to watch the object for about 4 more minutes in which it did not move at all until it suddenly blinked out and i turned back to the game. it is interesting enough to note that the soccer fields are right across the street from an abandoned air base (which is now a retirement home complex).
content.summary: Bright object above soccer field with plane above it

content.detailedDescription:
We were at our annual father/daughter camp out near lake wales, florida at the circle f dude ranch, heavily attend by vero beach residents.

at 6:37 pm, my daughter, myself and more than 50 fathers and daughters(possibily up to 100 but not sure) whose cabins faced the lake, saw 2 lights in the dark, western sky hovering.  very bright.  could hardly tell shape - they looked like circles.

the 2 then joined together and became 1, then split apart, became 3 objects.  they hovered then joined, became 1, then split again into 4, rejoined into 1, then split into 5.

at that point, they hovered, became one again and disappeared, reappearing about 10-15 seconds later - as 1.  same bright intensity of light.

suddenly the light was gone.  

waiting about 15 minutes and it never came back.

my daughter tried to take a picture and we have 2 - one of which when light enhanced, shows 2 circular objects touching.  the other shows obvious movement, which our daughter pointed was 2 then 3 lights.

my husband is a former decomarate usmc and is 100% sure that he did not see either flares, aircraft or parachutists.

(this was my husband and daughters 9th year).

this event was witnessed by at least 50 fathers and daughters, many of whom were very scared.

i can't atttach the photos now (technologically challenges with photo programs but will work on it.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 2 very bright lights hovering in sky joining into one, then split off into3  repeated up until 5

content.detailedDescription: Giant diamond, i was outside watching the sky because i have seen objects up there for the past few days off and on , there was a local story in the news paper about it and no one can idnetify what the objects are, i have seen lights orbiting the exterior of the craft. i first thought it was just a star untill i looked through some binoculars and i realized i seen a flying object. i am amazed by this and i am honored to be seeing it!
content.summary: Giant diamond

content.detailedDescription:
A friend and i were walking near the ut tower on the campus of the university of texas at night in the late fall or early winter of 1979.
there were dozens of people walking around as there always are arund there, and suddenly the whole area lit up in a golden/amber glow.
everyone was looking up, and above the ut tower, about a hundred feet above was a huge golden triangle with appendages at each corner like half-domed shaped lights but they might not have been lights as the whole object appeared to be lit up as far as i could tell. the object made no noise and moved very slowly, almost hovering above the tower. it was moving from north to south and then sped up heading towards the downtown area and seemed to just shoot out of sight very quickly. the whole timeframe was only about 10 seconds in duration that we got to see it.
interstingly enough, the next day on klbj radio in austin, an announcement was made that anyone who had seen an unusual craft need not worry as the government was testing a new vehicle. i would have to estimate the size of the craft as being nearly the length of a football field, and again it moved without any sound. i really doubt it was a military craft. i am happy to say that i recently found a post by someone else who has seen the object on that night. i felt really exstatic at the time but it has bothered me a great deal since then and always been on my mind. if anyone else was in that area at that time and knows anything about it i would be happy to discuss it.
content.summary: Very large gold/amber shape with bulbous extentions at each corner

content.detailedDescription:
I was on the front lawn drinking a coffee and looking at the sky behind my roof, spotting an unusually large golden/amberish star that was stationary, like the rest of the stars. suddenly it began moving, from its east position toward north. it moved slowly, without any noise or any blinking lights. i think it was climbing in altitude because its size began matching the rest of the stars. it moved northernly for about ten seconds or less, whereof it stopped, now hovering stationary once again.

i watched it for a few more minutes but it wasn't moving. then i went inside to get rid of the coffee cup. when i returned outside, the star was gone.
content.summary: A large golden star moves across sky and then remains hovering higher up
